imdb.title: D.Gray-man
imdb.plot: Young Allen Walker, an exorcist, fights Akuma to save the world.

episodes.title: Akuma wo karu shonen
episodes.plot: Evil is spreading across the globe, and young exorcist Allen Walker is humanity's greatest hope to survive the gathering storm.

episodes.title: Kuro no kyodan
episodes.plot: After a difficult journey, Allen reaches Black Order headquarters, but the scar above his left eye doesn't prompt anyone to roll out the red carpet.

episodes.title: Martel no borei
episodes.plot: Allen sets out to recover Innocence discovered in southern Italy. When a powerful Akuma attacks him, the exorcist comes face to face with something eerily familiar.

episodes.title: Tsuchiokina to kuya no aria
episodes.plot: An evolved Akuma - the most powerful foe Allen has ever encountered - turns the exorcist's own powers against him in a battle that can only end in self-destruction.

episodes.title: Komoriuta wo kikasete
episodes.plot: When an Akuma destroys a sentimental moment between the Ghost of Mater and her longtime companion, painful memories wash over Allen, and a ferocious rage erupts from him.

episodes.title: Wazawai wo yobu mono
episodes.plot: A daring attempt to save a little boy brings Allen face to face with the Millennium Earl! The two old foes play catch-up amidst a hail of poisoned Akuma bullets!

episodes.title: Kioku no bohyo
episodes.plot: Abandoned by his parents due to his gruesomely deformed left arm, Allen is left completely alone in the world until kindly Mana takes pity on him.

episodes.title: Kuro no kyodan kaimetsu jiken!?
episodes.plot: Allen still feels like a stranger at Black Order headquarters, and the young exorcist just can't shake the feeling that he is being kept in the dark about certain happenings.

episodes.title: Makimodoshi no machi
episodes.plot: Allen and Lenalee investigate a town where time repeats, but a gang of Akuma is hell-bent on making sure they recover the missing Innocence before the exorcists do.

episodes.title: Fuko na onna no innocence
episodes.plot: Allen and Lenalee must recover the lost Innocence and destroy the dream from which Miranda cannot wake. Standing in their paths is a devious adversary descended from an ancient lineage.

episodes.title: Miranda lotto no omoi
episodes.plot: Road Kamelot has arrived to stop Allen and Lenalee from recovering the Innocence and halting the cruel cycle of repetition plaguing the town.

episodes.title: Soshite machi ni yuki ga furi...
episodes.plot: Road reveals something about the Millennium Earl's grand scheme while battling the exorcists. Can Miranda harness her bizarre powers in time to save her new friends?

episodes.title: Coat to tomo ni
episodes.plot: After his showdown with Road, Allen's left eye is badly wounded. Until it heals, he'll be unable to distinguish between Akuma and the humans whose identities they assume.

episodes.title: Fukkatsu no ha
episodes.plot: Allen, Lavi, and Kanda investigate a region battered by violent weather changes. The exorcists believe Innocence may be to blame, but some locals put their faith in a mysterious legend.

episodes.title: Fubuki no hate
episodes.plot: Allen and his comrades encounter a family that managed to escape the grasp of the Millennium Earl - but succumbed to the devastation of a helpless, heartbroken father.

episodes.title: Sennen no kenshi
episodes.plot: When the Black Order learns of a fierce warrior who has vanquished all adversaries for over a thousand years, all signs point to the involvement of Innocence.

episodes.title: Kenshitachi no hokori
episodes.plot: Vittorio fights for a long-forgotten princess. Allen, Kanda, and Lenalee must separate the noble brute from his mysterious weapon - or suffer the wrath of his sword.

episodes.title: Lenalee no koi
episodes.plot: Driven by suspicion, Lenalee's brother unleashes Sir Komlin the Third. As the giant robot wreaks havoc, a threat with intentions born of the world's greatest evil goes unnoticed.

episodes.title: Kojo no kyuketsuki
episodes.plot: Allen is sent to search for his old master - General Cross. In a nearly deserted mountain town, he learns of a prophecy he'll be expected to fulfill.

episodes.title: Ganbare, exorcist-sama
episodes.plot: Krory has once again begun feeding on the blood of the living. Allen and Lavi must raid the castle and put an end to his reign of terror.

episodes.title: Krory, shugeki
episodes.plot: On a reconnaissance mission into the heart of Krory's lair, Allen and Lavi encounter a demonic army of plants with a true hunger for human flesh.

episodes.title: Eriâde no shinzitsu
episodes.plot: Allen's old master prophesized that a member of the Black Order would return to finish business with the dark menace Krory, and now the time for reckoning has arrived.

episodes.title: Watashi ga aishita kyûketsuki
episodes.plot: Krory and Eliade come from opposite sides of a ceaseless war. The lovers managed to find a brief moment of solace together, but ultimately, enemies must live as enemies.

episodes.title: Kurourî no tabi dachi
episodes.plot: From the ashes of a burning castle, a new breed of warrior emerges. Gone is the vampish killer - born anew is the naÃ¯ve exorcist Krory.

episodes.title: Gensui no kurari
episodes.plot: Allen crosses paths with Yeeger - the oldest general in the Black Order. After a fierce battle, a generous meal, and a heart-rending story of loss, the exorcist's spirit is renewed.

episodes.title: Shumatsu e no makuake
episodes.plot: Allen longs for a father figure to illuminate his path in life, and the Millennium Earl rouses the Clan of Noah to search for the Heart of Innocence.

episodes.title: Waga shi, Kurosu gensui
episodes.plot: The Millennium Earl summons the Clan of Noah, and the past comes back to haunt Allen when he and Lenalee are assigned to protect General Cross.

episodes.title: Ekusoshisuto kurourî
episodes.plot: Seeking the Heart of Innocence, the Clan of Noah savagely hunts down Black Order generals. Meanwhile, Krory prepares to embark upon his first solo mission.

episodes.title: Tamashii wo uru mono Zenpen
episodes.plot: Lenalee and Allen visit a seemingly quiet village where the exorcist and his master once spent happier days. They find no sign of General Cross - only a disturbing amount of funerals.

episodes.title: Tamashii wo uru mono Kouhen
episodes.plot: Allen and Lenalee suspect that a hospital director has cast his lot with the Millennium Earl. In order to confirm their suspicions, Lenalee goes undercover as a nurse.

episodes.title: Maigo no Miranda
episodes.plot: Evil stalks Miranda as she travels to Black Order headquarters. With only her precious clock as a traveling companion, she must rely on the kindness of strangers to reach her destination.

episodes.title: Nazo no yureisen
episodes.plot: Allen infiltrates a gang of aspiring pirates. When the group drifts into dangerous waters, the exorcist puts his life on the line to save his new friends from a familiar foe.

episodes.title: Majo no sumu mura Zenpen
episodes.plot: A mysterious piece of correspondence concerning General Cross's whereabouts prompts Kanda to steal away on a secret mission, but his rogue agenda is quickly abandoned to investigate reports of witchcraft.

episodes.title: Majo no sumu mura Kouhen
episodes.plot: When the people of an isolated village begin to believe the whispers about a witch haunting the streets at night, Kanda suddenly finds himself outnumbered by Akuma.

episodes.title: Kaze o matou ekusoshisuto
episodes.plot: Suman Dark is an exorcist with incredible powers, but at the dawn of an important mission, he exhibits a chilling disdain for a group of children hunted by wolves.

episodes.title: Yami no tobari
episodes.plot: The Millennium Earl gathers the Clan of Noah for a chaotic and violent breakfast. As exorcists everywhere fight for their lives, the Earl deals a hand of cards with murderous implications.

episodes.title: Rinjin no kane: Charitî beru
episodes.plot: General Tiedoll may hold the key to locating the Heart of Innocence, so it's urgent that the Black Order locate him before the Millennium Earl's henchmen.

episodes.title: Furowa tiedôru
episodes.plot: Swarms of Akuma track General Tiedoll to Barcelona, and Allen and Lenalee race towards the besieged city in a fleeting attempt to save their comrades.

episodes.title: Chinmoku no hitsugi
episodes.plot: The Black Order suppresses the Akuma forces at Barcelona, but many are lost in battle. As Allen and Lenalee set off to find General Cross, Tiedoll searches for new recruits.

episodes.title: Chinkon no bara
episodes.plot: Lavi and Krory are sent to protect Allen and Lenalee as they continue to look for General Cross. Their search is interrupted when Akuma attack a festival of roses.

episodes.title: Aratanaru sikyaku
episodes.plot: Stranded on a rain-drenched night, Allen and his friends are lured into a trap by a black cat, but a growling stomach may prove to be their saving grace.

episodes.title: Kuroneko no wana
episodes.plot: Lulu Bell dons a disarming disguise and leads Krory into a desert ambush, setting into motion her devious plan to divide and conquer Allen and his comrades.

episodes.title: Samayoeru sekizou
episodes.plot: Krory and Allen's attempted rendezvous with Lavi and Lenalee is derailed by their investigation of a walking statue. Is it Innocence at work or just another trap?

episodes.title: Tessen no jijo
episodes.plot: Lenalee's condition worsens, and Lavi knows he must get her to Bookman for immediate treatment; however, his daring rescue of a damsel in distress might cost him his Innocence.

episodes.title: Kimyou na yakata
episodes.plot: General Tiedoll enjoys painting the beautiful scenery he encounters, but Kanda is eager for action. Perhaps an Akuma outbreak at an unusual castle will satisfy both of their needs.

episodes.title: Hakugin no gen'ei
episodes.plot: Seeking a guide to lead them through a treacherous mountain pass, Allen and Krory stumble into a devious trap. Soon they will be visited by visions of the past.

episodes.title: Suishou no shoujo
episodes.plot: Allen and his friends arrive at a village stricken by a mysterious water shortage. Their investigation leads them to a fortune teller who recognizes Lenalee from a disturbing vision.

episodes.title: Yureru tekigousha
episodes.plot: Bookman and Lenalee trace the dwindling water supply back to a terrified fortune teller whose crystal ball might be an Innocence fragment.

episodes.title: Ruru Beru sama no suzu
episodes.plot: Before Mei Ling can begin her training as an exorcist, she must use her gift to help her new friends survive another deadly encounter with the deranged Mimi.

episodes.title: Itto na omoi
episodes.plot: The exorcists embark on a perilous mission to transport Mei Ling to headquarters, but Lulu Bell of the Noah Clan has a surprise waiting for them.

episodes.title: Shukkou, higashi e
episodes.plot: Allen and his friends resume their search for General Cross. After arriving at his last known location, they receive some terribly disheartening news.

episodes.title: Raishuu
episodes.plot: Allen and the other Exorcists set sail for Japan on Anita's ship. However, after leaving the harbor, they encounter a large swarm of Akuma.

episodes.title: Togaochi
episodes.plot: When Allen and Lenalee realize what became of Suman Dark, an Exorcist who went missing after his unit was attacked, they decide to rescue him.

episodes.title: Owari no yoru no hajimari
episodes.plot: Once Allen is back outside, he tries to persuade Suman to cease his destruction. In the meantime, Lenalee contacts Komui for information on fallen ones.

episodes.title: Sakebi
episodes.plot: Suman's destructive energy continues to destroy the village and its people. But when hearing a boy call for his father reminds Suman of his own daughter, the last phase of his life begins.

episodes.title: Derîto
episodes.plot: Suman has been killed before Allen's eyes. Allen realizes that Suman's killer is a Noah, but he is in no condition to fight him.

episodes.title: Shousitsu to saikai
episodes.plot: Samo Han Wong from the Black Order's Asian Branch brings word that Allen has been found and Lenalee and the others need to leave for Japan without him.

episodes.title: Ajia shibu
episodes.plot: Allen regains consciousness, surprised to find himself still alive. Bak Chang, the Chief of the Black Order's Asian Branch, explains how he survived.

episodes.title: Chikai no michi
episodes.plot: When Allen remains unable to activate his Innocence, Bak comes up with a strategy to arouse his Innocence by creating a sense of crisis.

episodes.title: Taitoru
episodes.plot: Miranda notices that the ship is under attack. When she and the others go up to the deck, they find an Akuma that seems different from the ones they've fought in the past.

episodes.title: Shizumu kuro
episodes.plot: Lenalee continues her one-on-one fight against Eshi, a Level 3 Akuma, while other Akuma attack the ship from the sky.

episodes.title: Yami ni ochita seijo
episodes.plot: Remembering that Allen released his Innocence forcibly to save Suman, Lenalee decides to do the same to save her "world."

episodes.title: Fune modorogi shoujo modorazu
episodes.plot: While Lenalee is fighting Eshi, the Exorcists back on the ship are having difficulty dealing with the ongoing Akuma attacks. Then Bookman comes up with a solution.

episodes.title: Messêji
episodes.plot: In the midst of Lavi's search for Lenalee, an Akuma suddenly appears before him and announces that he bears a message from Cross Marian.

episodes.title: Jouriku
episodes.plot: Lenalee, Lavi, and the others have finally arrived in Japan. However, when three Level 3 Akuma appear, the group decides to hide rather than risk fighting them.

episodes.title: Konwaku to shousou
episodes.plot: Allen continues to train with Fo in order to revive his Innocence, without much improvement. Some members of the Asian Branch start questioning the necessity of keeping Allen within their base.

episodes.title: Edo e
episodes.plot: Despite their best efforts, Lenalee and the others are unable to avoid the three Level 3 Akuma pursuing them. Just when they think they have no choice but to fight, an unexpected development occurs.

episodes.title: Chinmoku
episodes.plot: Allen's innocence still hasn't resumed a physical form despite his continued training with Fo. However, some changes are observed. Could they be a clue to the revival of Allen's innocence?

episodes.title: Shinnyuu
episodes.plot: A Level 3 Akuma whose dark matter holds the power of decomposition has invaded the Asian Branch base. As Allen still cannot activate his Innocence, Bak and the others try to protect him.

episodes.title: Kami no douka
episodes.plot: Even though Allen's body is half decomposed and he still hasn't been able to revive his Innocence, he returns to the Level 3's location in order to save Fo.

episodes.title: Shirusareta namae
episodes.plot: Now that Allen's Innocence has been revived, he wants to rejoin his comrades as soon as possible and tells Bak that he'll take the teleporting device the Level 3 took to the Asian Branch.

episodes.title: Teito kessen
episodes.plot: While Allen prepares to go to Edo, Lavi and the others are having difficulties fighting huge Akuma.

episodes.title: Kanda, sansen
episodes.plot: The Froi Tiedoll unit arrives in Edo. The General tells his apprentices to go help Lavi and the others, who continue to struggle against the huge Akuma and Tyki Mick.

episodes.title: Edo shoumetsu
episodes.plot: The black energy wave drawn out by the Millennium Earl swallows the city of Edo and causes further injuries to the members of the Cross unit.

episodes.title: Kuraun to Ôgyusuto
episodes.plot: Just when the Millennium Earl is about to snatch Lenalee, Allen arrives to rescue her. In the midst of a fierce battle, the Earl and Noahs suddenly disappear.

episodes.title: Kagi no Noa no tobira
episodes.plot: Lenalee is sucked into a star-shaped hole that suddenly appeared. When Allen tries to grab her hand, he also falls into the hole... and so do some other Exorcists.

episodes.title: Sukin borikku rûmu
episodes.plot: In one of the rooms in the ark, Allen and the others encounter Skinn Bolic, a member of the Clan of Noah. Kanda declares that he will fight Skinn while the others move forward to find the next door.

episodes.title: Kinki, sangenshiki
episodes.plot: The fight between Kanda and Skinn begins. When Kanda realizes that his attacks are barely affecting Skinn, he decides to use the powerful Sangen Style technique. Meanwhile, the room starts collapsing.

episodes.title: Noazu memorî
episodes.plot: Never forgive Innocence... Never forgive Exorcists... Skinn's anger and animosity keep him alive and push him to further attack Kanda.

episodes.title: Tsuinzu torappu
episodes.plot: While the Noahs mourn Skinn's death, Allen, Lenalee, and the others move forward, believing that Kanda is okay and will catch up with them soon.

episodes.title: Shakkin kuraishisu
episodes.plot: After failing in their mission to capture Cross Marian, Jasdero and Devit decide to wait for him in the ark and to kill time by going after his apprentice Allen.

episodes.title: Baddo gêmu
episodes.plot: The "Trick Glasses" created by Jasdero and Devit's ability make it difficult for Allen and Krory to fight them. Meanwhile, Lavi tries to find the lost key.

episodes.title: Jasudebi, toujou
episodes.plot: Jasdero and Devit have merged and become Jasdevi. Jasdevi is so overwhelmingly powerful that Allen, Lavi, and Krory have a hard time fighting him.

episodes.title: Buraddi kurourî
episodes.plot: Trapped in an iron maiden, Krory is beginning to lose consciousness when he hears the voice of the woman he loved. Meanwhile, Allen and the others arrive in the last room.

episodes.title: Yamiiro rapusodî
episodes.plot: In the last room, the battle between Allen and Tyki Mikk begins, while Road tells Lavi to play with her if he wants to win the freedom of Lenalee and Chaozii.

episodes.title: Yowakihito
episodes.plot: The difference in power between Allen and Tyki is so great that Tyki easily knocks Allen down. Meanwhile, Lavi suffers and faces illusions in a dream created by Road.

episodes.title: Rinkaisha
episodes.plot: Amidst great crisis, Allen's synchronization with his Innocence becomes stronger than ever, which results in his left arm turning into a large sword.

episodes.title: Rabi
episodes.plot: Lavi is trapped in the world of dreams created by Road. There, he's attacked by the people at the Black Order, including Lenalee and the other Exorcists.

episodes.title: Yami no koe
episodes.plot: While being burned by his own attack, Lavi asks his illusion for what purpose Bookmen exist and why wars never disappear from the human world.

episodes.title: Burakku kânibaru
episodes.plot: The Noah within Tyki Mikk was supposed to have been destroyed by Allen; however, he has transformed into a dreadful figure and starts attacking Allen and the others.

episodes.title: Jajjimento
episodes.plot: After transforming, Tyki is completely in a different league from Allen and Lavi; however, they continue to fight against him. Then someone unexpected appears to rescue them.

episodes.title: Senritsu
episodes.plot: When Allen comes upon a piano in The Fourteenth's secret room, he suddenly starts hearing a song in his head and, much to his own surprise, finds himself playing it.

episodes.title: Kikyou
episodes.plot: After the ark returns to its original shape, Allen and the others go back to Edo, to the Asian Branch, and finally, to the Order's headquarters, where they are joyously welcomed back by the Order's staff.

episodes.title: Hitsuji to inu
episodes.plot: While the Order's staff celebrates the return of the Exorcists, Director Rouvelier, a Special Inspector from the Central Agency, holds an advisory council meeting to question Cross Marian.

episodes.title: Daga susumu toki no hari
episodes.plot: Howard Link comes to see Allen and declares his intention to keep an eye on him. Surprised by the news, Lenalee goes to see Komui in his office, where she's greeted by Director Rouvelier.

episodes.title: Honbu shutsugeki
episodes.plot: Lab 5, where the egg is situated, is now under attack. Detecting the Akuma, Allen and some others rush to the lab, where they are stymied by a wall blocking the entrance.

episodes.title: Gensui no chikara
episodes.plot: While keeping the Exorcists without Innocence on standby, Komui sends Marie, Miranda, and the four Generals to Lab 5 to join Allen and Bookman to fight Lulu Bell and Akuma.

episodes.title: Iro no Noa
episodes.plot: Once all the Akuma are down, Komui resolves to destroy the egg, which will be no easy task since Lulu Bell is using Miranda as a shield to protect it.

episodes.title: Reberu 4
episodes.plot: A Level 4 Akuma has finally been born. Allen attacks it relentlessly, even though its overwhelming presence sends a shiver through his body.

episodes.title: Daikirai na kamisama e
episodes.plot: Not knowing the status of the Exorcists in Lab 5, Komui decides to have all headquarters personnel evacuate. Meanwhile, Rouvelier takes Lenalee to Hevlaska.

episodes.title: Yakusoku no kotoba
episodes.plot: Determined to protect her brother and the others at home, Lenalee drinks her Innocence in order to synchronize. Meanwhile, Allen pushes through his serious injuries in order to continue fighting the Level 4.

episodes.title: Nagai asa ni hibiku
episodes.plot: After Allen and Lenalee defeat the Level 4 Akuma, Cross tells Komui to cancel the evacuation. However, the cancellation may be premature...
